message: Let's be fair, Bob. Take this deal and avoid the risk of inflation!
I'm being generous, Alice.  Let's wrap this up now before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Bob, my friend, this deal benefits us both.  Let's be reasonable and seal the deal before inflation hurts you even more!
Alice, time is running out! This is my final offer. Take it before inflation makes it pointless for both of us!
Bob, I'm sticking to my guns. This is a fair deal considering the inflation working against you. Let's be smart and end this here.
